Name: Royal Rescue SRPG
About the game: 'Royal Rescue SRPG' is a role-playing game with a turn-based combat system. It was a nice calm day ... But from here out of nowhere Princess is kidnapped from the Kingdom, you get a secret mission to save her! Challenge yourself in several quests, face the enemies of the kingdom and save the princess! Visit villages, collect items, explore the world, fight enemies. FEATURES 3-4 hours of pure SRPG fun Strategy role-playing game Control base Side quests Classic soundtrack
Publishers: Source Byte Sp. z o.o.,Blacer Studio
